Summary: I knowisted a large bright ball heading over the house tonight while looking out the front door. My husband and I walked out to watch it as it came over us, making no sound and looked like giant a fire ball.
divs: Sighting DetailsI knowisted a large bright ball heading over the house tonight while looking out the front door. My husband and I walked out to watch it as it came over us. It made no sound and looked like a giant fire ball. It was flying in a straight line at a moderate to slow speed. It was above the tree tops and appeared to be flying lower than a small air craft would fly.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Oxford
There were 2 other sightings in Oxford on or around May 26th 2012
